title: Dogcopter 3
description: The third installment of Dogcopter, based on the popular book series. In a world where humanity is pushed to the brink, it turns out that the one who was most human is a dog… copter.
quote: Some people say you can’t teach an old dog, new tricks. Unless you’re Dogcopter.
altHero: a dog with helicopter blade extending from his back flies over a city
alt1: a giant robot destroying the city
alt2: a girl gives a smug smile to the dog on the ground
alt3: dogcopter flies toward the giant robot
alt4: dogcopter, in the air, lifts its tail and a missle shoots out from his butt
